ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: DDD worthless?  How would you change it?
ygData.msgSnippet: D OH thanks for correcting me (lazy lookup there) Okay - but none the less - with the exception of Whee (and anyone else who has yet to voice up).  We all
ygData.messageBody:
D"OH thanks for correcting me (lazy lookup there)

Okay - but none the less - with the exception of Whee (and anyone else who
has yet to voice up). We all think that the song is at best marginally
useful. Some feel that the damage output is too low - given the 20-30
minutes it takes to regen the mana. Many feel that that it would be better
targeted than AOE; that the 55 spell is nice for those that are 55 - but not
an factor for those of us between 43 and 55.

Slyde
-----Original Message-----
From: Reeves, Patrick W [mailto:pwr3@...]
Sent: Monday, March 05, 2001 4:15 PM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: DDD worthless? How would you change it?

No you are dicussing the lvl 43 song Denon's Desperate Dirge (targeted AE
DD) not the lvl 18 song Denon's Disruptive Discord (PB AE DoT).

-----Original Message-----
From: Daniel P. Sniderman [mailto:fuzzbone@...]
Sent: Monday, March 05, 2001 2:07 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: DDD worthless? How would you change it?


We're discussing a LEVEL EIGHTEEN song - and you bring up a level 55? I'm
53 by the way. What percentage of bards are 55+?

Slyde

- FB

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Monday, March 05, 2001 4:08 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: DDD worthless? How would you change it?

At 02:55 PM 3/5/01 -0600, you wrote:
>I think it's clear from the contradictory posts here that a lot of people
>HAVE put thought into this and don't agree that 400 damage is appropriate
>for the mobs that higher level bards would feel. Also a desire for a
single
>targeted spell as opposed to targeted AOE...

you mean like the level 55 one?
